article:
This is a list of butterfly species found in Karnataka State. In this state
about 318 species of butterflies have been recorded.

* PapilionidaeâSwallowtail Butterflies (19 species)
* PieridaeâYellow-White Butterflies (29 species)
* NymphalidaeâBrush-Footed Butterflies (92 species)
* LycaenidaeâBlues, hairstreaks and Gossamer-Winged Butterflies (98 species)
* HesperiidaeâSkipper Butterflies (80 species)
